comment._content: Amazing to me that this job still existed in 1953!

comment._content: I believe the horse's name was Whinny-the-Pooh

comment.author: 39204824@N00
comment._content: The job, otherwise known as 'tonnenman' ('barrelman'), still existed in the mid-sixties in certain places in Holland (Delft, for instance).
